title: KWIS: Matematika SD Kelas 1
description: Sebuah gim edukasi interaktif yang membantu anak belajar matematika dasar melalui kuis bergambar yang seru dan penuh warna.
longDescription:
📘 KWIS: Matematika SD Kelas 1 — Belajar Asyik & Interaktif!

KWIS: Matematika SD Kelas 1 adalah gim edukasi interaktif untuk membantu anak belajar berhitung dengan cara yang menyenangkan!
Jawab 108 soal latihan yang mencakup penjumlahan, pengurangan, perbandingan, dan pola angka. Semua dikemas dalam bentuk kuis berwarna yang menarik.

🎮 Fitur Gim:
🧮 108 Soal Matematika Dasar: Melatih konsep penjumlahan, pengurangan, urutan angka, dan logika sederhana.
🌈 Soal Interaktif & Bergambar: Dirancang agar anak belajar sambil bermain.
🏆 Level Bertahap: Tantangan meningkat seiring kemajuan pemain.
🔊 Umpan Balik Suara & Visual: Memberi semangat dan membantu pemahaman anak.
📴 Mode Offline: Dapat dimainkan tanpa internet, kapan pun, di mana pun.
💰 Opsi Tanpa Iklan: Nikmati pengalaman belajar yang lebih fokus dengan pembelian satu kali untuk menghapus iklan.
👧 Aman untuk Anak: Tanpa login, tanpa akun, fokus pada pengalaman belajar.

KWIS dirancang khusus untuk siswa SD kelas 1 agar belajar matematika terasa seperti bermain: seru, ringan, dan mendidik!
Cocok untuk orang tua dan guru yang ingin mengenalkan konsep dasar matematika dengan cara yang menyenangkan.

title: Gridverse: Wild — hidden logic
description: Sebuah teka-teki kotak-kotak yang melatih strategi dan keberanianmu saat membuka ruang-ruang tersembunyi.
longDescription:
💣 Gridverse: Wild — Logic Meets Danger!

Dive into Gridverse: Wild, a minimalist twist on the classic Minesweeper — designed for sharp minds and careful clickers.

Every tap counts. Every move could reveal a treasure or trigger a trap. Can you clear the grid without hitting the hidden hazards?

🎮 Game Features:
🧠 Minesweeper Logic — Reveal cells, avoid hidden traps, and use numbers to deduce safe spots.
⏱️ Timed Challenge — Test your speed and precision under pressure.
💀 No Hints, No Safety Net — One wrong click could end your run. Win with pure strategy.
🏆 Global Leaderboard — Compete with players worldwide via Google Play Games.
🌌 Minimalist Visuals — Focus on the grid, not the clutter.
📴 Offline Mode — Play anywhere, anytime, without an internet connection.

Whether you’re a Minesweeper veteran or a new challenger seeking tactical thrill, Gridverse: Wild delivers a clean, intense puzzle experience — one grid at a time.

title: Gridverse: Nine — icon sudoku
description: Sebuah teka-teki kotak-kotak yang mengasah logika dan kemampuanmu mengenali pola lewat susunan simbol-simbol.
longDescription:
9️⃣ Gridverse: Nine — Pure Logic, Timed Challenge!

Step into Gridverse: Nine, a clean and minimalist take on the classic Sudoku — designed for true puzzle purists.

No hints, no undo, no distractions — just your logic, focus, and the ticking clock.

🎮 Game Features:
🧠 Classic Sudoku Rules — Fill the grid so every row, column, and box has 9 different symbols.
⏱️ Timer Challenge — Race against time and test your speed and accuracy.
💀 No Hints, No Mercy — Every mistake counts. Win with pure reasoning.
🏆 Global Leaderboard — Compete with friends worldwide via Google Play Games.
🌌 Minimalist Visuals — Clean design for maximum concentration.
📴 Offline Mode — Play anywhere, anytime, no internet required.

Whether you’re a Sudoku expert or a new challenger seeking focus and flow, Gridverse: Nine offers a pure, uninterrupted puzzle experience — one grid at a time.

title: Buttons 6 — color nonogram
description: Sebuah teka-teki kotak-kotak yang menguji ketelitian dan logikamu saat menyusun gambar langkah demi langkah.
longDescription:
🧩 Buttons 6: Parrot & Monkey — Color Nonogram Logic Puzzle

Buttons 6: Parrot & Monkey is a color nonogram word puzzle where every level hides a secret color grid. Use simple logic and just two buttons — Parrot and Monkey — to solve each colorful mystery.

Each stage gives you numeric color clues, just like a nonogram, but with a minimalist twist. Tap the right Duck and Penguin sequence to fill the grid and reveal the hidden color pattern!

🎮 Game Features:
🌈 Unique Color Nonogram Gameplay — Solve puzzles using numeric color clues and logic.
🐾 Two-Button Controls — Use Parrot and Monkey buttons to build your color combo.
🔢 Smart Color Logic — Each number shows how many of each color appear in the grid.
🎯 Instant Feedback — Watch the grid update in real time as you input each sequence.
🧠 Brain-Training Fun — Simple to play, challenging to master logic puzzles.
🎨 Minimalist Art Style — Clean visuals and vibrant color reveals.
🏆 Achievement System — Unlock achievements as you solve puzzles and improve your logic skills.
📴 Offline Play — Enjoy anywhere, anytime without internet access.

Whether you love nonograms, color puzzles, or brain training games, Buttons 6: Parrot & Monkey offers a fresh twist with just two buttons and endless colorful combinations.

title: Flappy Custom: Arcade Fly
description: Sebuah gim arkade yang menguji ketepatan dan waktu reaksi saat kamu melewati rintangan tanpa akhir.
longDescription:
🕹️ Flappy Custom — Tap, Fly & Customize!

Flappy Custom is a fast-paced arcade flying game inspired by the legendary flappy challenge — but with a creative twist! Tap to flap, dodge obstacles, and soar through colorful skies with a character that’s uniquely yours.

🎮 Game Features:
🚀 Classic Tap-to-Flap Gameplay — Easy to learn, hard to master.
🎨 Customizable Characters — Unlock fun skins and fly in style.
🌈 Smooth Visuals — Clean graphics and satisfying animations.
🏆 Global Leaderboard & Achievements — Compete with friends worldwide via Google Play Games.
📴 Offline Mode — Play anywhere, anytime, no internet required.

Whether you’re a casual player or a flappy veteran, Flappy Custom delivers that classic tap-to-fly thrill you love — now with custom skins and global competition.
